CustomField.description: This Field is used to capture Account Type value on Account records related to Contact on Initiative Member and the value will be used in workflow logic to send Client Satisfaction and Business Outcome Survey to Client
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This Field is used to capture Account Type value on Account records related to Contact on Initiative Member and the value will be used in workflow logic to send Client Satisfaction and Business Outcome Survey to Client
CustomField.label: Related Contact Account Type
